bibl.title: Photograph of Julian Zunzunegui Lopez and his family on the steps of his house, 1941

div1.head: Photograph of Julian Zunzunegui Lopez and his family on the steps of his house, 1941
div1.p:
No. 26
HS now Born June 23, 1893
Sr. Julian Zunzunequi y Lopez & family in
the house which he built for himself and
occupied in 1936, abandoning the shack
(Bldg. No.1) where he had resided with his
parents from the age of 10 (1903) 1907 to age 43
(1936). While he was living in the shack
his father died there. After he got married,
21 years ago, he continued to live there and
all three of his children were born
there. From left to right: Mercedes, the youngest
of the children (15); Demetrio (19) Sra. Ana Rivero
Zunzunegui (the mother); Julian (the father) and Julian
(17), the young girl on the right being a visiting
relative. Sr. Zunzunegui is now 47, having been
7 years old at the time of the experiements. He has a
prosperous lime business, owns his own home and 3 or four other houses.
